resources.string: Add movies to your favorites to watch here

During numerous more than impossible missions, Dom Toretto and his family have been able to outsmart, have more courage and go faster than any enemy that came their way. But now they will have to face the most lethal opponent they have ever known: a terrible danger that resurfaces from the past, who is driven by a bloody thirst for revenge and who is ready to tear the family apart and destroy forever everything Dom holds dear. it matters.
